name: The Spring Summoner
description:
Enter a frozen maze and use your magic to restore the Sun's strength.

Watch the maze transform as you progress through the maze

WASD for movement
Free mouse movement (third person)
1 key for primary fireball
2 key for super jump spell
3 key for lightning

Controller support for gameplay but not menu navigation.


All content was created within the timeline for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam. 


The game is fairly demanding/poorly optimised so don't expect to play on a laptop.
